Translations.Text: Sonohi ware wa, hito o otagaini oshiyoseru nami no yo ni makaseyou. Sonotoki rappa ga fuka re, sorede ware wa subete no mono o isseini atsumeru
Sonohi ware wa, fushin-sha-tachi ni jigoku o gen washi,-bi no hen ni miseru
Me ni kutsugae ga sa rete ita mono wa, ware o nenjiru koto kara (tozakari), kiku koto mo dekinaide ita
Shinjinai-sha-tachi wa, ware o sashioite ware no shimo be o hogo-sha to suru koto ga dekiru to kangaeru no ka. Hontoni ware wa, fushin-sha o kantai suru tame ni, jigoku o junbi shite iru
Gen tte yaru ga i. `Dare ga okonai ni oite saidai no shippai-shadearu ka, tsugeyou ka
Tsumari jibunde wa yoi koto o shite iru to, kare-ra wa kangaete iruga, gense no seikatsu ni oite no doryoku ga, subete machigatta michi ni itte shimau yona-sha-tachidearu
Korera no mono wa,-nushi no shirushi, mata omo to no kaiken o shinjinai-sha-tachi de, kare-ra no okonai wa muda ni nari, ware wa shinpan no hi ni kare-ra ni don'na mekata mo ataenaidearou
Sore ga kare-ra ni totte tozen no mukui no jigokudearu. Kare-ra wa shinko o kyohi shi, ware no shirushi ya shito-tachi o chosho shitakaradearu
Hontoni shinko shite zenko ni hagemu mono ni taisuru kantai wa, tengoku no rakuendearu
Kare-ra wa soko ni eien ni sumou. Kare-ra wa soko kara utsuru koto o nozomanai

Itte yaru ga i. `Tatoe umi ga,-nushi no o kotoba o shirusu tame no sumideatte mo,-nushi no o kotoba ga tsukinai naka ni, umi wa kanarazu tsukai tsukusa reyou. Tatoe watashi-tachi ga (hoka no) sore to onaji (umi) o hoju no tame ni motte mo

Gen tte yaru ga i. `Watashi wa anata gata to onaji, tada no ningen ni suginai. Anata gata no kami wa, yuiitsu no kami (arra)dearu koto ga, watashi ni keiji sa reta nodearu. Oyoso daredemo,-nushi to no kaiken o koi negau mono wa, tadashi okonai o shi nasai. Kare no omo o Takashiru baai ni nanihitotsu (doi ni) haichi shite suhai shite wa naranai
Kafu ha ya Ain sado
(Koreha) anata no omo ga, shimo be no zakariya ni o jihi o ataeta koto no kijutsudearu
Kare ga hisoka ni seigan shite, omoni inotta toki o omoe
Kare wa itta. `Omo yo, watashi no hone wa hontoni yowamari, mata atama no kami wa haiiro ni kagayakimasu. Daga omo yo, watashi wa anata ni o inori shite, onmegumi o atae rarenai koto wa arimasen
Tadatada watashi no nochi no, kinshin (to doho no koto) o osoremasu. Watashi no tsuma wa funindesu. Sorede anata no omoto kara, sozoku-sha o watashi ni o sazuke kudasai
Watashi o tsuga se, mata yaakobu no ie o tsuga sete kudasai. Omo yo, kare o o inikanau-sha ni shite kudasai
(Nushi wa ose rareta. ) `Zakariya yo, hontoni ware wa anata ni, yahiya to iu na no musuko no kippo o tsutaeru. Ware wa imada katsute darenimo sononaha sadzukenakatta
Kare wa moshiageta. `Omo yo, watashi ni doshite musuko ga arimashou. Watashi no tsuma wa funindesu. Sono Ue watashi wa kiwamete korei ni narimashita
Kare wa itta. `Sodearou. (Daga) anata no omo wa ose rareru. “Sore wa ware ni totte wa yoina kotodearu. Anata ga nani mo nai toki ni, ware ga izen anata o tsukutta yo ni.”
Kare wa moshiageta. `Omo yo shirushi o o shimeshi kudasai.' Kare wa itta. `Anata no karada wa, kenzendearinagara, shirushi to shite 3 yoru no ma hito ni hanasenaku narudearou
Sokode kare wa Sei-sho o dete hitobito no tokoro ni kite,`asanayuna (omo o) tatae nasai.' To temane de tsutaeta
(Soshite kare no musuko ni.)`Yahiya yo, keiten o shikkari to mamore.'(To meirei ga kudatta). Soshite ware wa, yosho (no toki) kare ni eichi o sazuke
mata waga moto kara jiai to seijun'na kokoro o sazuketa. Kare wa omo o osore
fubo ni koko de komandenaku, somuku koto mo nakatta
Kare no seitan no hi, shikyo no hi, fukkatsu no hi ni, kare no ue ni heian'are
Mata kono Keisuke no naka de, maruyamu (no monogatari) o nobeyo. Ka no on'na ga kazoku kara hanarete azuma no ba ni hiki komotta toki
ka no on'na wa kare-ra kara (mi o saegiru) maku o tareta. Sonotoki ware wa waga seirei (jiburiru) o tsukawashita. Kare wa 1-ri no rippana ningen no sugata de kano on'na no mae ni arawareta
Kano on'na wa itta. `Anata (jiburiru) ni taishite jihibukaki okata no mikago o inorimasu. Moshi anata ga,-nushi o osorete ora rerunaraba (watashi ni chikayoranaide kudasai)
Kare wa itta. `Watashi wa, anata no nushi kara tsukawasa reta shito ni suginai. Seijun'na musuko o anata ni sazukeru (shirase no) tame ni
Ka no on'na wa itta. `Imada katsute, dare mo watashi ni furemasen. Mata watashi wa futeide mo arimasen. Doshite watashi ni musuko ga arimashou

Kare (tenshi) wa itta. `Sodearou. (Daga) anata no omo wa ose rareru. “Sore wa ware ni totte wa yoina kotodearu. Sore de kare (musuko) o hitobito e no shirushi to nashi, mata ware kara no jihi to suru tamedearu. (Kore wa sudeni) arra no o meirei ga atta kotodearu.”
